data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Moquegua that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moquegua, Peru
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 163,800 citizens of Moquegua, Peru, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Moquegua, Peru so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Moquegua, Peru. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Asheninka, South Ucayali people. 1.4% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Moquegua that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Moquegua, Peru.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 23,599 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
